companies.name: Primechain Technologies
companies.description: Primechain Technologies focuses on blockchain-powered solutions for financial services, including cross-border payments and trade finance. Their innovations have been adopted by various banks in India.

companies.name: Antier Solutions
companies.description: Antier Solutions provides a wide range of blockchain services including coin development, DeFi development, crypto banking solutions, and NFT platforms, catering to businesses looking to leverage blockchain technology.

summary: The analysis highlights two promising emerging Indian startups in blockchain technology. Primechain Technologies aims to innovate financial services with blockchain, while Antier Solutions offers comprehensive blockchain services for various applications.
query_used: top emerging Indian startups in Blockchain technology funding recent innovation
